_header: As a clerk witnesseth of wisdom that can
_description: The heart as master of the tongue — two couplets translating ‘Cor lingue capud est sicud uir femine…’ written to its left in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Als a clerk withnesset of wisdom þat canHerte of tunge meister
                    is as man of wommanÞat þe tunge no word speken ne suldeBut
                    as þe herte assenteded & seyde þat he wolde
